resources.string:
- To start the game click on "Start"
 - To change the displayed theme click on "Themes"
 - To see the highscores click on "Highscores"
 - If you need help in any section, you can access to it through the top bar.

In this section you have to put your ships on your grid. The way to do it is by choosing the type of ship you want to put from the menu on top and click in the box where you want to put it.


You must use all the ships provided; in order to know how many are left to use you're given a number next to the type of ship you're about to use, in the same menu as the types of ships.


When you want to use a ship that's larger than one square, you'll have to put the bottom of the ship on a square and the app will automatically put the rest of the parts on top.
 BE CAREFUL! You can't put a ship in an already occupied square.

Para empezar a jugar el juego tienes que pinchar en "Empezar", tanto desde el menú principal como desde la barra superior. A continuación deberás elegir la dificultad en la que jugar. Se te permitirá posicionar tus barcos y empezará el juego. Para atacar a un barco pulsa en su posición en el tablero del enemigo. No podrás atacar dos veces en la misma posición. Gana el primero que destruya los barcos enemigos.
You have to choose a ship type before you can place it on the grid!
The position you chose doesn\'t allow the rest of the ship to be created! Place the ship in a way that there is enough space on the right to allow the rest of the ship to be created.
There are no more ships of this type left!
